clean_shelf.description: Clean the shelf of the dishwasher to remove any food residues

pick_dish_from_shelf.description: Pick a dish from the sliding shelf of the dishwasher

open_door.description: Open the rotation door of the dishwasher

close_door.description: Close the rotation door of the dishwasher

rotate_knob.description: Rotate the knob of the dishwasher to change settings

clean_knob.description: Clean the knob of the dishwasher for hygiene purposes

clean_body.description: Clean the outer body of the dishwasher

clean_whole_dishwasher.description: Clean the entire dishwasher including the knob, door, shelf, and body
